articles.author: Brian Hiatt
articles.title: Vernon Reid on Why Sly and the Family Stone Were the Greatest American Band - Rolling Stone
articles.description: With the death of Sly Stone, Living Colour guitarist Vernon Reid goes deep on the greatness and enduring influence of Stone and his band.
articles.content: In the wake of Sly Stone’s death at age 82, Living Colour guitarist Vernon Reid made the case for why Sly and the Family Stone deserve a place at the top of the canon of American bands. Here it is, i… [+6363 chars]

articles.author: Asawin Suebsaeng, Andrew Perez, Ryan Bort
articles.title: Trump Finally Gets the Police State He’s Been Craving for Years - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Donald Trump has long wanted to preside over a police state in America. His wish is coming true he deploys troops in Los Angeles amid ICE protests.
articles.content: Donald Trump has long fantasized about deploying the U.S. military to various Democratic strongholds across the country, regardless of whether the elected liberals there want him to or not. He’s fina… [+8586 chars]
